name: EON SHELL
description:
Events take place in the distant future when humanity learned to separate consciousness from the body and move it to various kinds of machines. We play as a robot scout who has never encountered this type of machine people. Our first mission is to scout a small area of a newly discovered planet.

Controls
Keyboard + Mouse
LMB - Attack/Dash-Attack
RMB - Interact
WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
Shift - Dash/BackFlip
